A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am an avid SW fan and have been looking forward to this next installment of SW and found myself supremely disappointed. I unferstand wanting to move on from the \"Skywalker\" arc of the story but continually dwstroying the true essence to what SW is to give us new isnt a good way to do it. The story is rushed\, the charractor plots are rushed and the older SW charractors are sent out the door in a way that is not true to what SW is. This movie was also over disneyified (to much needless comedy force into the script). As much of a fan as I am\, I am now not looking fwd to the future of what SW is becoming. Here is to hoping that this soon becomes better then episodes 1-3.
